Description: This may not be DBCS issue. NPE is thrown on opening prefernces HTML and JSP files.
 Build date: Eclipse 3.2 M6, WTP I200603302119, IBM JRE 5.0 SR-1
 OS: WindowsXP Japanese sp2
        Steps to recreate problem:
        1- Window > Preferences, expand tree of "Web and XML"
        2- click HTML Files
        3- click JSP Files
 
Following NPE is thrown,
eclipse.buildId=I20060331-2000
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Windows XP x86-32 j9vmwi3223-20060222a (JIT enabled)
J9VM - 20060220_05389_lHdSMR
JIT  - 20060220_2133_r8
GC   - 20060214_AA
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=ja_JP
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -consolelog

Easy fix ... I'll take this one (its bugging me :)
adding lawrence as there's some rumor's he'd be interested. :)

I've committed fix to head. Will be in 4/7 I-build. 

Lesson to learn: designing classes to be subclassed is hard ... needs lots of protection against subclasses clobbering logic in super class.
Thanks for handling David. Designing classes to be subclassed is doubly hard when we're all referencing each other's internals :)
